LanguageData.VME_AwkwardViolentConversion.stages.0.de: That violent conversion was awkward. The words were vague and unconvincing.
LanguageData.VME_SatisfyingViolentConversion.stages.0: That violent conversion was satisfying. The speech was stirring and enjoyable to listen to.
That violent conversion was electrifying! Surely our beliefs will prevail over any others!
